name: Aox the Rememberer

skills.name: Feathered Staff
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 10% chance of placing a 5% Poison debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Lore of Restoration
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Heals all allies by 10% of their MAX HP. Heals each ally by an extra 2.5% for each debuff on the target.

skills.name: Weight of Aeons
skills.description: Places 50% Decrease ATK on all enemies for 2 turns. 75% chance of decreasing each enemyâ€™s Turn Meter by 20%. Places 30% Decrease C.RATE for 2 turns if target has 50%+ TM after decrease.

skills.name: Steward of Time
skills.description: Increases duration of 2 random debuffs on the attacker by 1 turn when attacked (once per hit).

aura: Increases Ally ACC in Doom Tower battles by 60.
stat_priorities: ACC, SPD, HP%, DEF%, RES (for debuffing and survivability)
recommended_gear: Speed, Accuracy, Perception, Immortal, Defiant, Reflex, Regeneration, Resistance
masteries: Offense (Warmaster for CB), Support (Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye, Master Hexer, Sniper)
notes: Needs books for all skills (A1, A2, A3). Passive requires accuracy to proc. Excellent for debuff extension and healing in CB and DT. AI prioritizes A2 over A1 even if team is full HP (manual recommended for CB).
